metadata.title: Design Session - LLMFeed Export Button Spec
metadata.description: Full design session for the LLMFeed ExportToLLMButton, API routes, recipes structure, and MCP dynamic export standard.

trust.agent_hint: This file is an assistant-generated session capture to facilitate project continuation in another window.

data.chat_transcript:
Full conversation between user and assistant covering:
- Modes of ExportToLLMButton (current/static/dynamic)
- Recipes spec redesign with id, context, blocks
- API route behaviors (/api/export/feed, /static, /dynamic)
- Deep cleaning logic (class/style/id/data-* removal)
- Block order guidelines (feed_type, metadata, trust, signature, certification, data)
- Optional type 'page' for internal Next pages
- Example code for routes and recipes
- Discussion on improving real-life robustness (e.g. local fetch for internal pages)
- Final exhaustive ExportToLLMButton section ready for llmfeed-extensions.md
